word_mean: 引起兴奋的，刺激的：尤指通过神经组织引起肌肉纤维紧张而产生兴奋的

英语词汇的奥秘 ... excitant 兴奋剂 stimulant 刺激物 decolourant 脱色剂.
刺激剂（stimulant）(Stimulants)　　刺激荆(Stimulants)可对人体神经系统产生刺诬帮助提高机能状态的药物的统称。刺激剂（stimulant）可分先类:①局部麻醉药;…
stillborn 死产的stimulant 剌激剂stimulating therapy 剌激疗法

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin stimulant- 'urging, goading', from the verb stimulare

entry.tran: 兴奋剂;引起兴奋的药物
entry.def: A stimulant is a drug that makes your body work faster, often increasing your heart rate and making you less likely to sleep.

means.word_mean: 1. any stimulating information or event; acts to arouse action
2. a drug that temporarily quickens some vital process
